Netlify Service

What did you think of our service during the time you used it? Be honest! “it sucked” isn’t a wrong answer unless you don’t elaborate and provide some constructive criticism ;)

I've honestly never used anything like Netlify before and I loved it. Even if I don't get the job I plan on using the service again and would recommend it to others.
I already have a few friends and family in mind that could definitely use it. I loved the fact that it was so easy to launch the site and the configuration options that it gave me.
